exterior.title: Landscaping and Curb Appeal Enhancement
exterior.description: Improve the front yard with new sod, flower beds, and shrubs. Add a stone pathway leading to the entrance and install outdoor lighting to enhance curb appeal.

exterior.title: Deck and Pergola Upgrade
exterior.description: Refinish the existing deck and pergola. Add weather-resistant furniture and outdoor lighting to create a more inviting outdoor space.

exterior.title: Driveway Resurfacing
exterior.description: Resurface the driveway to improve its appearance and functionality. This will enhance the overall look of the property.

exterior.title: Fence Repair and Painting
exterior.description: Repair any damaged sections of the fence and apply a fresh coat of paint to improve the backyard's appearance and privacy.

exterior.title: Exterior Paint Touch-Up
exterior.description: Touch up the exterior paint where needed to maintain the house's appearance and protect it from the elements.

bath.title: Update Half Bath Fixtures
bath.description: Replace the sink and faucet in the half bath with modern fixtures to enhance the aesthetic appeal. This is a cost-effective way to update the space without a full renovation.

bath.title: Upgrade Master Bath Shower
bath.description: Replace the existing shower with a frameless glass shower enclosure. This modernizes the bathroom and increases the perceived value of the home.

bath.title: Install Heated Flooring
bath.description: Add heated flooring to the master bath for a luxurious touch. This feature is highly desirable in colder climates and can significantly increase the home's value.

bath.title: Replace Bathroom Lighting
bath.description: Update the lighting fixtures in both bathrooms to modern, energy-efficient options. Improved lighting can enhance the overall ambiance and functionality of the space.

bedroom.title: Add Built-in Wardrobes
bedroom.description: Install built-in wardrobes to maximize storage space and enhance the room's functionality. This is especially beneficial in smaller bedrooms where space is limited.

bedroom.title: Upgrade Lighting Fixtures
bedroom.description: Replace outdated lighting fixtures with modern, energy-efficient options. Consider adding dimmable lights to create a versatile ambiance.

bedroom.title: Paint and Accent Walls
bedroom.description: Refresh the bedrooms with a new coat of paint. Consider adding an accent wall with a bold color or wallpaper to add character and style.

bedroom.title: Install Hardwood Flooring
bedroom.description: Replace existing flooring with hardwood to increase the property's value and appeal. Hardwood is durable and attractive to potential buyers.

bedroom.title: Add Crown Molding
bedroom.description: Install crown molding to add elegance and a finished look to the bedrooms. This detail can significantly enhance the aesthetic appeal.

kitchen.title: Upgrade Kitchen Lighting
kitchen.description: Install modern, energy-efficient LED lighting fixtures to enhance the kitchen's ambiance and functionality. Consider under-cabinet lighting and pendant lights over the island.

kitchen.title: Replace Countertops
kitchen.description: Upgrade the countertops to quartz or granite for a more modern and durable surface. This can significantly enhance the kitchen's appeal and value.

kitchen.title: Cabinet Hardware Update
kitchen.description: Replace the cabinet handles and knobs with modern, stylish options to give the kitchen a fresh look without a full remodel.

kitchen.title: Backsplash Refresh
kitchen.description: Install a new backsplash with modern tiles to add character and style to the kitchen. Consider subway tiles or mosaic patterns.

kitchen.title: Paint Touch-Up
kitchen.description: Repaint the kitchen walls and cabinets with a fresh, neutral color to brighten the space and make it more appealing to potential buyers.

living area.title: Fireplace Upgrade
living area.description: Upgrade the existing fireplace to a modern, energy-efficient model. This can enhance the aesthetic appeal and improve energy efficiency, making the living area more attractive to potential buyers.

living area.title: Lighting Enhancement
living area.description: Install modern, energy-efficient LED lighting fixtures and add dimmer switches. This will improve the ambiance and energy efficiency of the living space.

living area.title: Flooring Refinishing
living area.description: Refinish the existing hardwood floors to restore their original shine and beauty. This can significantly enhance the overall look of the living area.

living area.title: Accent Wall Addition
living area.description: Add an accent wall using paint or wallpaper to create a focal point in the living area. This is a cost-effective way to add character and style.

living area.title: Open Concept Conversion
living area.description: Remove non-load-bearing walls to create an open-concept living and dining area. This modern layout is highly desirable and can increase the property's value.

other.title: Home Office Upgrade
other.description: Transform the space into a modern home office with updated shelving, a fresh coat of paint, and improved lighting. This appeals to remote workers and adds value to the property.

other.title: Reading Nook Creation
other.description: Convert the area into a cozy reading nook with comfortable seating, new shelving for books, and soft lighting. This adds charm and functionality to the space.

other.title: Multi-Functional Space Conversion
other.description: Redesign the room to serve multiple purposes, such as a guest room and office. Install a Murphy bed, add storage solutions, and update the decor to maximize utility and appeal.
